sentence.Network_en: The arbitral tribunal shall be entitled to require security for the costs of such measures.
sentence.Network_cn: 仲裁庭应有权要求对此种措施的费用缴付保证金.

sentence.Network_en: We may discuss to agree upon a temporary arbitral body when needed.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要时,我们可以讨论协商成立一个临时的仲裁机构.

sentence.Network_en: The arbitral award rendered shall be final and binding on both Parties.
sentence.Network_cn: 其作出的)该仲裁裁决为终局裁决,对双方均有约束力.
